column5: Still hasn't run out of gas!!   https://www.thestar.com/news/insight/2018/04/06/hockey-night-in-canadas-original-tv-pitchman-turns-100.html
Wow, I remember him from the late 50's as a kid, B&W TV of course  and  Wednesday's game you only caught the last half as they had regular programming on for the first period or so.
We used to ha an Esso station at Dufferin and Westmount and the guy that opened it looked a lot like him and dressed the same hat and all
Remember back then when the only real commercials were BETWEEN the periods! All you saw during a break in action was maybe an outline of a tire rolling across the screen, or maybe a battery!!
